TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReplicationConnection extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 類別代表複寫連接。

span.span: The class represents a replication connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Active Directory 網域服務中的複寫連接被以 NTDS 連接物件。In Active Directory Domain Services, a replication connection is represented by an NTDS-Connection object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「[NTDS Test-connection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)」 主題位於 MSDN Library， [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the "[NTDS-Connection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)" topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

span.span: Demand value:

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ReplicationConnection (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string name, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer sourceServer);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string name, class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer sourceServer) cil managed
Public Sub New (context As DirectoryContext, name As String, sourceServer As DirectoryServer)

param.name: context
param.span: 物件，包含要用來建立複寫連接的目標和認證。

span.span: A object that contains the target and credentials with which to establish a replication connection.

param.name: name
param.span: 連接的使用者定義名稱。

span.span: The user-defined name of the connection.

param.name: sourceServer
param.span: 物件，可識別連接的來源伺服器。

span.span: A object that identifies the source server of the connection.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified context, name, and source server.

exception.span: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 下列任何一項原因都可能導致這個例外狀況發生。

span.span: This exception will occur for any one of the following reasons:

exception.span: - 參數的目標不是網域控制站或 AD LDS 執行個體。

span.span: - The target of the parameter is not a domain controller or AD LDS instance.

exception.span: - 無效或為空字串。

span.span: - is invalid or an empty string.

exception.span: - 在 參數中指定的目標不符合在 參數中指定的伺服器類型。

span.span: - The target specified in the parameter does not match the server type specified in the parameter.

exception.span: 伺服器必須為網域控制站或 AD LDS 執行個體。

span.span: The servers must both be either domain controllers or AD LDS instances.

exception.span: - 在 和 參數中指定的伺服器為網域控制站，但不在相同的樹系內。

span.span: - The servers specified in the and parameters are domain controllers, but are not in the same forest.

exception.span: - 在 和 參數中指定的伺服器為 AD LDS 執行個體，但不屬於相同的組態集。

span.span: - The servers specified in the and parameters are AD LDS instances, but do not belong to the same configuration set.

exception.span: 或 為 。

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 所提供的認證不正確。

span.span: The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 認可伺服器的複寫連接。

span.span: Commits the replication connection to the server.

summary.span: 要等到呼叫這個方法之後，這個複寫連接物件才會實際存在於 Active Directory 網域服務中。

span.span: The replication connection object does not actually exist in Active Directory Domain Services until this method is called.

exception.span: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 物件已被處置。

span.span: The object has been disposed.

exception.span: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

span.span: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourceServer As String
public: property System::String ^ SourceServer { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個複寫連接之來源伺服器的 DNS 名稱。

span.span: Gets the DNS name of the server that is the source of this replication connection.

value.span: 字串，包含這個複寫連接之來源伺服器的 DNS 名稱。

span.span: A string that contains the DNS name of the server that is the source of this replication connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 擷取複寫連接的名稱。

span.span: Retrieves the name of the replication connection.

returns.span: 字串，包含複寫連接的名稱。

span.span: A string that contains the name of the replication connection.

exception.span: 目前的物件已經處置。

span.span: The current object has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TransportType As ActiveDirectoryTransportType

summary.span: 取得這個複寫連接所使用的傳輸類型。

span.span: Gets the type of transport that is used by this replication connection.

value.span: 其中一個 成員，可指定這個複寫連接所使用的傳輸類型。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the type of transport that is used by this replication connection.

exception.span: 目前的物件已經處置。

span.span: The current object has been disposed.
